name: Space Debris (itch)
description:
Space Debris Ludum Dare 42 Theme : Running out of space

You have to destroy the space debris that is falling from the sky, if not the screen will fill up with debris and you will be unable to move.

Controls:

  • Move:
    WASD or Arrow keys
  • Fire / Shoot:
    Space Bar

Version 1.1:
Fixed the bug where you are no longer able to shoot you do so to fast
Lowered the volume of the music that plays during the game
Made sure the lasers are deleted when they hit the walls
